name: Dan_Hayward
text:
Dan Hayward
Dan Hayward was a physician at Calhoun Memorial Hospital, a practice he founded in 1925.
On September 9, 1947, Hayward examined Maggie Coulson, who disappeared in the woods for several hours, alongside Carl Rodd and Alan Traherne.
In 1952, Hayward's practice was taken over by his son, Will.
